data.name: LANDNAV
data.detailed_description:
LANDNAV is the ultimate adventure race.

Core Gameplay

  • Plan your route using authentic compass and topographic map techniques.
  • Prepare for your journey by carefully selecting your loadout of real-world technical outdoors gear.
  • Survive natures extremes.
  • Win Events. Earn cash. Expand your gear selection, opening new possibilities in how you can travel and survive.
  • Run. Bike. Climb. Your athletic skills will grow to reflect your own unique playstyle.
  • Non-linear, open world, emergent gameplay. 100% freedom to overcome challenges your way and earn a true sense of accomplishment. Mountains don't move. How will find the fastest way to get to the other side?

Game Types

  • Military training - learn how to use a map and compass.
  • Military Culmination Exercise - Take on the world's most challenging navigation exam.
  • Orienteering Career - Go from zero to hero as you climb the brackets of a world class orienteering event.
  • Cross-Country Orienteering - Given a route on a map, who can complete it the fastest?
  • Score Orienteering - Given a selection of Control Points in the field, each worth a certain number of points, who can get the highest score before time runs out?
  • Mountaineering - Orienteering taken to the ultimate extreme. Who can bag summits the quickest? An epic challenge.

LANDNAV is suitable as a training supplement for military and outdoors professionals. 1 to 1 parity with real world map and compass techniques.

In development now.
Check back soon as this page will be continually updated. Visit the official webpage and join the Discord to stay up to date with the latest news. Don't forget to wishlist!

data.short_description: LANDNAV is the ultimate adventure race. Plan. Prepare. Survive. Excel. Use real world navigation techniques to blaze your path across awe inspiring vistas. Become an unstoppable adventure athlete.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, 64-bit Windows 8 (8.1) or 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
